title: Natalie Crypto Wallet
author: Natalie Crypto Wallet
created_time: March 21, 2023, 03:11:04 PMLast edit: March 22, 2023, 01:47:07 PM by Natalie Crypto Wallet
content: üí∞üí´BOUNTYüí´üí∞ CryptoWallet | 1 million SPEND Tokens Up for Grabs! [ESCROW]We‚Äôre giving away $40,000 worth of SPEND Tokens ‚Äì join our bounty to earn your stake and get ready for the most advanced crypto card on the market!https://i.imgur.com/5pbVxt9.pngSign up to the campaign using this formhttps://i.ibb.co/68Y81NG/01-1280x160.pngCryptoWallet is about to take the world by storm. Our platform is already live, and we‚Äôre launching our card toward the end of 2023 and moving into the global market next year with over 10,000 supported cryptos on the card. We are targeting total compatibility of all cryptos on the market shortly afterward.https://i.ibb.co/W3n04z1/unnamed.pngJoin us on social media for more updates, or sign up to use CryptoWallet online:DiscordWebsiteTwitterTelegramLinkedinhttps://i.ibb.co/xhpSXYH/02-1280x160-1.pngSPEND tokens are a deflationary asset that become scarcer over time due to token burns.SPEND is a utility token used to:1. Order new cards2. Vote for new token listings3. Buy/sell crypto with discounted fees4. Earn cashback on card5. Receive APR on stakingAs a bounty program participant, you‚Äôll be one of the first people in the world to receive our deflationary token!SPEND tokens will be held in escrow and distributed to stakeholders‚Äô CryptoWallet accounts upon token launch. We‚Äôre distributing 1 million pre-sale SPEND tokens worth $40,000 USD to the participants of this bounty program.[/b]https://i.ibb.co/vXHfCYC/03-1280x160.pngOur bounty program launches a week from now on 21 March and will run for six weeks.Sign up to the campaign using this formhttps://i.ibb.co/Yth0VFR/04-1280x160.png50% Twitter50% Discord https://i.ibb.co/dQsqcXQ/05-1280x160.png Rewards100 - 300 followers: 1 stake per week301 - 1,000 followers: 2 stakes per week1,001 - 3,000 followers: 3 stakes per week3,001 - 10,000 followers: 4 stakes per week10,000+ followers: 5 stakes per weekhttps://i.ibb.co/hFzdwgr/06-1280x160.pngMust have minimum of 100 followers and account set to publicFollow CryptoWallet on Twitter and join us on Telegram and DiscordMust make either one new post OR retweet a post from our account each dayNew posts must mention and tag CryptoWallet and use #crypto and #BTC. 50 character minimum, post should describe and support the projectThe public sale price of 1 SPEND Token is $0.04.Must leave a supportive comment on any new CryptoWallet posts made in the last 24 hours (one comment per post)Must make one additional post each week inviting followers to our Discord, including #crypto and #BTC hashtagsTwitter accounts will be audited for bot followers ‚Äì genuine accounts onlyWe reserve the right to close the giveaway at any time.No foul language to be used, no mention of the bounty program at any timeUsing multiple accounts per person is not allowedhttps://i.ibb.co/Ldbwh0f/07-1280x160.pngRewards5 posts per week: 1 stakes per week10 posts per week: 2 stakes per week15 posts per week: 3 stakes per week20 posts per week: 4 stakes per week25+ posts per week: 5 stakes per weekhttps://i.ibb.co/hFzdwgr/06-1280x160.pngJoin our DiscordMinimum 5 posts or comments per week supporting CryptoWalletIf your post or comment is part of a thread or receives comments, you must reply at least three times to keep the conversation going.Spam words and phrases like ‚Äúhello,‚Äù ‚Äúgoodbye,‚Äù ‚Äúgood comment‚Äù are discountedYour Discord name may not include the name of another crypto projectReact to one CryptoWallet-related comment or post per day each week. This can be from CryptoWallet or from another Discord member discussing the project.Invite at least one other person to Discord (for entire campaign)Using multiple accounts per person is not allowedhttps://i.ibb.co/x1f9Jyr/08-1280x160.pngReport your participation by adding your username, profile link, Telegram handle, and the campaigns you aim to participate in once in the thread below:¬†#PROOF OF REGISTRATION¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Forum Username:¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Forum Profile Link:¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Telegram Username:¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†Participated Campaigns:Report Participation on TwitterComment this code at the end of each week including the links to each relevant post. Change week #1 to week #2 for your report at the end of week 2. Week #1: Twitter CampaignPost or retweet link #2: Post or retweet link #2: Post or retweet link #3: Post or retweet link #4: Post or retweet link #5: Post or retweet link #6: Post or retweet link #7: Comment under CW tweet #1:Comment under CW tweet #2:Etc.Link to post inviting people to Discord:Report Discord Campaign ParticipationYou can include a Discord campaign report in the same comment as the Twitter report  if you‚Äôre participating in both campaigns.Here‚Äôs the form:Week #1: Discord CampaignLink to post/comment:Link to post/comment:Etc.That‚Äôs it!Ready to earn deflationary SPEND tokens that become scarcer over time?Let‚Äôs do it!
